title: Opinion: Leaders say we need a 'conversation on migration'. The public are way ahead of them
description: Finian Murphy shares what he learned about how Europe is responding to big social issues from travelling by train.
content: THIS SUMMER, INSPIRED by the late Manchán Magans Europe by Train series, my family and I travelled by train from Dublin/Holyhead to Malmö, Sweden, crossing the UK, France, Belgium, the Netherlands, G… [+7071 chars]
